TravelerSTSMod:Sentence.NAME: Verse
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVerse is increased by #b1 when you play a card and is reset to #b1 at the start of turn.

TravelerSTSMod:HeartLock.NAME: Heart Lock
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #yVerse reaches 7 stacks, reset it to #b1 and gain #b

TravelerSTSMod:Whisper.NAME: Whisper
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, deal damage to each one with #yWhispers equal to the #yWhispers it has and reduce its #yWhispers by #b1. #yWhisper removes at the start of the owner's turn.

TravelerSTSMod:WhisperNextTurn.NAME: Whisper(Next Turn)
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the owner's next turn, apply #b

TravelerSTSMod:EchoSpell.NAME: Echo Spell
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVerses are reduced by half instead of ALL at the start of enemies' turn.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellAmplify.NAME: Spell Amplification
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a Spell, gain #b

TravelerSTSMod:GazeOfAbyss.NAME: Gaze From The Abyss
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #yWhispers to a random enemy at the amount equal to #yVerses you have at the end of last turn. (unstackable)

TravelerSTSMod:GazeOfAbyssUpgraded.NAME: Gaze From The Abyss(Upgraded)
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #yWhispers to a ALL enemies at the amount equal to #yVerses you have at the end of last turn. (unstackable)

TravelerSTSMod:VoiceOfDark.NAME: Voice Of Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yWhispers to an enemy, apply #yPoison to the enemy at the same amount.

TravelerSTSMod:AbsorbSpell.NAME: Absortion Spell
DESCRIPTIONS: Convert attack damage blocked this turn to your Block next turn. (unstackable)

TravelerSTSMod:BloodInk.NAME: Blood Ink
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever there's a need to consume #yInk, consume #yBlood #yInk instead. #yBlood #yInk is reudced by #b1 at the start of turn.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellIntensify.NAME: Spell Intensification
DESCRIPTIONS: For each other Spell you've played this turn, draw #b

TravelerSTSMod:Inking.NAME: Inking
DESCRIPTIONS: Add an additional card reward in the non-boss combat reward. (unstackable)

TravelerSTSMod:QuickCasting.NAME: Swift Casting
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Spell, #yExhaust it and draw #b

TravelerSTSMod:PrideForm.NAME: Pride Form
DESCRIPTIONS: random #yPersonality to your hand at the start of your turn. The #yPersonality gains Ethereal.

TravelerSTSMod:PrideFormUpgraded.NAME: Pride Form(Upgraded)
DESCRIPTIONS: random #yPersonality to your hand at the start of your turn. #yUpgrade the #yPersonality and it gains Ethereal.

TravelerSTSMod:BadOmen.NAME: Evil Omen
DESCRIPTIONS: The enemy keeps ALL #yWhispers at the start of its next turn.
